description: Amendments to planning permission dated 29 September 2023 (RN: 23/02348/FULL) for external alterations including; the partial demolition of existing mansard roof and corner coping to accommodate a new and extended lift; installation of replacement windows at rear lower ground and ground floor level; installation of replacement entrance steps; installation of plant within lowered vault at lower ground floor level, installation of louvered vault doors; installation of a plant enclosure, photovoltaics and a living green roof at part main roof level; creation of terrace with access hatch and associated works at part main roof level for use in connection with the existing office accommodation (Class E); NAMELY, to revise the description of development to: External alterations including; the partial demolition of existing mansard roof and corner coping to accommodate a new and extended lift; installation of replacement windows; installation of replacement steps to the principle elevation of the property; installation of plant within lowered vault at lower ground floor level, installation of louvered vault doors; installation of plant equipment, photovoltaics and a living green roof at part main roof level; creation of terrace with access hatch; associated works at part main roof level; and associated external changes for use in connection with the existing office accommodation (Class E)
